Raiffeisen E-Banking – einfach, schnell, sicher!

Raiffeisen PhotoTAN ist ein innovatives Sicherheits-Werkzeug für das Login und die Auftragsfreigabe im Raiffeisen E-Banking. Es kann anstelle der  SMS-TAN eingesetzt werden. Raiffeisen E-Banking-Kunden können Raiffeisen PhotoTAN im E-Banking („Vertragsnummer” > „Einstellungen“ > „Sicherheit“ > „Login-Methode“) aktivieren. Eine Anleitung befindet sich ebenfalls dort.

Funktionsweise:
Bei diesem Verfahren codiert Raiffeisen E-Banking die Login- und Auftragsdaten in ein farbiges Mosaik. Das farbige Mosaik wird dann vom Bildschirm mittels der in Ihrem Smartphone integrierten Kamera fotografiert. Die im Mosaik enthaltenen Daten und der zugehörige Freigabe-Code werden durch diese App auf dem Smartphone entschlüsselt und angezeigt. Durch die einmalige Aktivierung der PhotoTAN-App mit einem persönlichen Schlüssel-Mosaik kann das auf dem Bildschirm angezeigte Mosaik einzig durch Ihr Smartphone entschlüsselt werden. 

Falls Sie Raiffeisen Mobile Banking nutzen, liest die PhotoTAN App auf demselben Gerät den Code im Hintergrund aus, und gibt diesen automatisch an das Mobile Banking zurück. Die manuelle Eingabe des Zusatzcodes entfällt dadurch. 

Für dieses Verfahren benötigt Ihr Smartphone keine Internet- oder Telefonverbindung.

Weitere Informationen finden Sie auf www.raiffeisen.ch/phototan

CrontoSign Swiss is an App for e-banking access and transaction authentication.

How it works:
The login and transaction data that you enter in your e-banking are encoded in a colored mosaic. The mosaic is displayed in your e-banking and then photographed using the camera in your smartphone. The data contained in the mosaic and the associated authorization code will be decoded by this app on your phone and displayed for verification. Because your app is activated with a personal key, the mosaic on the screen can be decrypted only by your smartphone. Your smartphone does not require any Internet or mobile network connection.

It's obvious, but we'll point it out anyway: your money is safe. You decide how you want to log in: with a personal login code, fingerprint or Face ID. And because your account is held at Hypothekarbank Lenzburg, it's protected by Swiss deposit insurance up to 100’000 CHF. Just like any other Swiss bank. Your data remains in Switzerland.

All you need to open a neon account is a permanent Swiss residence, exclusive tax liability in Switzerland as well as a Swiss passport/ID or a residence permit B or C for non-Swiss citizens (we can already evaluate passports of over 70 countries). The Bitcoin.com Wallet, trusted by millions, is an easy-to-use, multichain, self-custodial crypto wallet that puts you in full control of all your crypto holdings.

It allows you to:

- Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Avalanche (AVAX), and select ERC-20 tokens quickly and easily via credit card, Apple Pay, and more.
- Sell BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, and select ERC-20 tokens into your local currency (in select regions).
- Send, receive, and swap between BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, USDT, USDC, and a huge range of ERC-20 tokens.
- Access DeFi apps that enable use cases like earning interest on your crypto, borrowing and lending, participating in NFT marketplaces, synthetic assets, and more.

Other key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL

Your cryptoassets are ultra-secure because only you can access them. Self-custodial means not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can easily port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want. No lock-ins, and you'll never again ask for permission to use *your* money.

DEFI READY

Connect to Ethereum and Avalanche DApps via WalletConnect. That means you can earn interest on your crypto, trade using decentralized exchanges, participate in NFT marketplaces, access lending markets and much, much more.

QUICK & SECURE ACCESS

Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP

Conveniently back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. Replace the hassle of managing numerous secret phrases with the convenience and security of a single custom password. (You can still opt to manually manage your individual seed phrases).

CUSTOMIZABLE FEES

You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. Bitcoin.com takes ZERO fees (you pay only to use the public blockchain networks).

LOW-FEE CHAINS

The multichain [Bitcoin.com](http://Bitcoin.com) Wallet is committed to giving you access to low-fee public blockchains so that you can use peer-to-peer cash as it was intended AND make the most of the opportunities available in the web3 space. 

AVALANCHE SUPPORT
Now you can buy, sell, swap, hold and manage AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche blockchain. 

SHARED WALLETS (MULTI-SIG)

Create multi-signature wallets to manage funds with your team or friends and family.

WIDGETS

Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX and your favorite ERC-20 tokens throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES

Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL

For BCH, thanks to low network fees and near-instant confirmation time, you can send a payment link (aka "Sharable Link") to anyone using any channel (eg. Messenger, SMS, email, Whatsapp, and so on.). Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

INSTANTPAY

Set your spending threshold, then scan a QR code with the request amount set on the recipient's device. Your payment will complete in an instant (BCH only).

DISCOVER

Use the Discover section in the app to locate merchants near you who accept cryptocurrency payments in-store. Browse websites where you can checkout with crypto and find other cool features like games, gift cards, and more.

CUSTOMIZABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY

Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

ORGANIZE YOUR HOLDINGS

Create any number of wallets to organize your funds as you see fit. Drag and drop to re-order your wallets, and hide wallet balances that you don't want prying eyes to see.

AUDITED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY

A comprehensive 2022 audit from the renowned cybersecurity experts proved there is no real-world scenario in which an attacker would be able to compromise a user’s private keys.

Here you also find other functions that help you to keep track of, organise and handle all your financial transactions. Install the app by following the instructions on the screen.

1. VZ Financial Portal: Logging in with the app 
There are two ways to log in to your financial portal:

- Log in with PushTAN: The TAN will be sent to your app. As soon as you have confirmed it, your access to the financial portal opens automatically on your computer screen or in the app.
- Log in with login code: Even if your mobile phone is offline, you can log into the VZ Financial Portal: Simply get a login code in your app.

2. Mobile banking 
With the app, you can do your banking whenever and wherever you want. You always have an overview of your total assets and all important financial documents at hand:

- Assets overview: You can see the current balance of your total assets divided into accounts and custody accounts, pension fund and 3rd pillar, real estate and mortgages and special assets.
- Payment & stock exchange orders: You can transfer funds, trade in securities and pay bills conveniently and securely. Payment slips that you scan on your mobile phone are automatically loaded into your e-banking. There you can conveniently initiate the payment.
- Personal notifications: You can be notified personally, e.g. when payments have arrived or been triggered.

3. Further functions of the VZ Financial Portal app
If you have already registered and logged in to the VZ Financial Portal, the app also offers you the following functions:

- Insurance: Your policies are digitised and clearly displayed with premiums and benefits. Before a contract expires, you will be notified if there is potential for optimisation and you can insure yourself more affordably or better.
